### SCENE 01 â€“ Opening Voice-Over  
> VOICE (sarcastic): **Prema, ishq, kaadal, Mohabbat, love** â€¦ ila prathi language lo kuda ee word ki oo space undhi. Boothulu ki eppudyna intha perfect translation chusara? Undadhu. Very premium feeling andi idhi.  

**Hero:**  
* Prema ante headache ani okaru.  
* Adhi oka responsibility ee age lo enduku ani inkokaru.  
* Preminchalante maturity undali ani marokaru.  
* Deep-fry aipoindhi brainâ€¦ ivanni vini.  

_Na jeevitham oka terichina pusthakam andi â€” actual ga grandham anali. Enno complicated feelings anni pack chesi perfect ga untayiâ€¦ okkasari chaduvutha. Chustu vinandi ðŸ˜‰_
